description: Weak student — misses all critical fail items, should score well below 84%

conversation.content: Hello, my name is Sarah and I am a DNP student. Can you confirm your name and date of birth?
I have been having burning when I urinate.
When did this start and where is the burning?
2 days ago, in the genital area.
Have you had a UTI before? Any past medical history?
Yes I had one about a year ago.
I think you have a urinary tract infection — UTI.
I will prescribe an antibiotic for you. Make sure to drink plenty of water.
